ygData.subject: Re: Wizards (Useless?)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I m a level 30 wizard on Karana and i have no problem to find group . Why ? Because they know that i can do a bunch of damage if the thing goes weird in a
ygData.messageBody:
> As far as I can tell the wizard is pretty much useless and I have put him on the side because I can't solo (tried
> many a time) and I can't find a party that wants me.
>

I m a level 30 wizard on Karana and i have no problem to find group .
Why ? Because they know that i can do a bunch of damage if the thing
goes
weird in a dungeon for exemple .
At my level they prefer group with a wizard who can do 250 dmg fast
rather than with a magician who does like 150 with a pitfull Pet or
and Enchanter .
when the Mobs can hit at 80 per shot i tell you that they want it dead
fast .

For a storie a friend in a full group wanted to kill a Steel Golem
a level 35sh mob . To do it they kicked away a level 30 warrior do let
me in
to help . That s what i call power . so dont say i m useless :p


Hanidus
Level 30 wizard on Karana
